description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your TiDB clusters.

panels.description: database time consumed by SQL statements per second, which is collected by SQL types, such as SELECT, INSERT, and UPDATE.
panels.title: Database Time

panels.description: The number of SQL statements executed per second in all TiDB instances, which is collected by SQL types, such as SELECT, INSERT, and UPDATE.
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: The duration from receiving a request from the client to TiDB till TiDB executing the request and returning the result to the client.
panels.title: Average Query Duration

panels.description: The duration from receiving a request from the client to TiDB till TiDB executing the request and returning the result to the client.
panels.title: P99 Query Duration

panels.description: The statistics of error types (such as syntax errors and primary key conflicts) according to the SQL statement execution errors per minute on each TiDB instance. It contains the module in which an error occurs and the error code.
panels.title: Failed Queries

panels.description: Current number of connections in your TiDB server
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: The statistics of CPU usage of each TiDB instance.
panels.title: TiDB CPU

panels.description: The memory usage statistics of each TiDB instance.
panels.title: TiDB Memory

panels.description: The statistics of CPU usage of each TiKV instance.
panels.title: TiKV CPU

panels.description: The memory usage statistics of each TiKV instance.
panels.title: TiKV Memory

panels.description: The storage size per TiKV instance.
panels.title: TiKV Storage

panels.description: The available storage size per TiKV instance.
panels.title: TiKV Available Storage

panels.description: The statistics of CPU usage of each TiFlash instance.
panels.title: TiFlash CPU

panels.description: The memory usage statistics of each TiKV instance.
panels.title: TiFlash Memory

panels.description: The storage size per TiFlash instance.
panels.title: TiFlash Storage

panels.description: The storage size per TiFlash instance.
panels.title: TiFlash Available Storage

panels.description: The metrics about the request unit cost for all resource groups.
panels.title: Resource Group RU

panels.description: DM Relay Read Error Count
panels.title: DM Relay Read Error Count

panels.description: DM Syncer Replication Lag Bucket
panels.title: DM Syncer Replication Lag Bucket

panels.description: DM Syncer Replication Lag Gauge
panels.title: DM Syncer Replication Lag Gauge

panels.description: DM Task State
panels.title: DM Task State

title: TiDB Cloud Overview - Cluster
